```{r ðŸ”§_global_options, include = FALSE, chace = FALSE}
library("rmarkdown", "knitr", "ggplot2")
options(width = 90, 
        xtable.comment = FALSE, xtable.caption.placement = "top",
        xtable.include.rownames = FALSE, xtable.NA.string = "NA",
        xtable.size = "footnotesize")
### knitr chunk options ###
opts_chunk$set(
  chace      = FALSE,
  echo       = FALSE,
  warning    = FALSE,
  message    = FALSE,
  tidy       = TRUE,
  fig.path   = "Figure/",
  fig.width  = 6, 
  fig.height = 6,
  fig.retina = 1,
  dev        = c("pdf", "png"),
  dpi        = 150)
theme_set(theme_classic(base_size = 18, base_family = "Helvetica"))
```
